snippet: A statue to honor former President Woodrow Wilson has been unveiled in the Czech capital again, nearly 70 years after the Nazis destroyed the first one.
lead_paragraph: A statue to honor former President Woodrow Wilson has been unveiled in the Czech capital again, nearly 70 years after the Nazis destroyed the first one.

headline.main: Czech Republic: Woodrow Wilson Is Honored With a Statue, Again
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Woodrow Wilson Is Honored With a Statue, Again
